messages.message: @Rakesh This seems to have a good effect, thank you! We still have an issue with the ‘Demonstracao do resultado’ column or ‘Income Statement’ table. We changed this to the english form (Income statement/demonstration of results) and also tweaked the prompts but were unable to get that table. here is the example here:

Hi @Gwen
The third table here did not get detected by Form recognizer for some reason (detection error).
We can use a regular reasoning query to extract this.
I tried to simply get Income statement and that did not work great - had to give LLM more context.
So something like this as a reasoning prompt in build did work fine - but its a bit of workaround to get this working - this does get you the entire income statement table.
`Extract Income statement for 31 december 2022 and 2021 and format as a table`
cc: @Lalit to add this doc to data set.
